home.title: Welcome to the Home Page
home.content: This is the home page of our SPA example. It dynamically loads content without reloading the page.

about.title: About Us
about.content: We are building a simple Single Page Application using vanilla JavaScript. The data for this section is dynamically loaded from a JSON file.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: Feel free to reach out to us through the contact form or by email. Our team will be happy to assist you.
